description.message: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.
description.description: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

desallzoom.message: Apply the zoom level to all pages.
desallzoom.description: Apply the zoom level to all pages.

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!
ratedes.description: And let everyone know about this great extension!

titeldownloadaaupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.
titeldownloadaaupgrade.description: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.
titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.description: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.
titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.description: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.message: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.
titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.description: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.

titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.message: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. But when you click the icon, let the current time, month, day and days of the week.
titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.description: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. But when you click the icon, let the current time, month, day and days of the week.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page
desrememberpage.description: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!
longdonatetext.description: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.
enjoyshare.description: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser
titelsyncbrowser.description: Sync the extension settings with your other browser

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
titeldownloadupgrade.description: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

descontextmenu.message: Enable the right click menu to zoom in or out the web page
descontextmenu.description: Enable the right click menu to zoom in or out the web page

desbadge.message: Show the current zoom value in the Zoom Extension icon
desbadge.description: Show the current zoom value in the Zoom Extension icon

deszoomsteps.message: The zoom steps for the next value

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Zoom Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Zoom extension in your web browser.
welcomebasictext.description: Welcome on the Zoom Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Zoom extension in your web browser.
